general_info.summary: This document lists various programs, schools, and initiatives associated with Sharda University. It includes academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research, alongside administrative and support functions such as examination reports, the Academic Bank of Credits, and various student-focused services like career counseling and skill enhancement. The list also touches upon university governance, history, global presence (Uzbekistan, Agra), and specific programs like FM Radio and mentoring portals.
